      public void addItemInformation(String itemName, String quantity, String price, String calories)
      Adds a new row to the item table with the provided information.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the item to be added to the table.
      quantity - The quantity of the item to be added to the table.
      price - The price of the item to be added to the table.
      calories - The calorie information of the item to be added to the table.
